examples: The decision left them very disappointed.
I was bitterly disappointed when I didn't get into university. If you think I'll agree to that, then you're going to be sadly disappointed.
He seemed almost disappointed when I agreed to go.
After convincing myself that the result didn't matter, I felt oddly disappointed when we lost.
I'm disappointed about John not coming.
I was slightly disappointed by her attitude.
We're disappointed with the new car.
